com.example.felix.notizen.BackEnd.Logger

Class cNoteLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.felix.notizen.BackEnd.Logger.cNoteLogger

  • public class cNoteLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    logger class for logging into a log file logger decides on set log level whether to log the given message or not if level is below log level Created as part of notes in package com.example.felix.notizen.BackEnd by Felix "nepumuk" Wiemann on 03/06/17.

        private void writeMessagesToFile()
                          throws cNoteLoggerException

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String logLocation,
                 int debugLevel)
        init the logger with log file location and debug level
        Parameters:
        logLocation - location to store log file
        debugLevel - log level to use

      • getFormattedLogEntry

        private java.lang.String getFormattedLogEntry(cLogEntry logEntry)
        builds a string containing the info of logEntry eg: 2017-06-01 16:05:17:123 [INFO]: func created
        Parameters:
        logEntry - log entry with all info (message, timestamp, log-level)
        Returns:
        string of log entry ready to put in log-file

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws cNoteLoggerException
